name: Chicken with Orange-Mustard Sauce
author: Sezzah
summary: Drumsticks coated with an orange-mustard sauce are an ideal picnic food: delicious hot or cold and you don't even need a plate.
directions: Prick chicken in several places using a fork; arrange in a large dish in 1 layer
Season with salt and pepper and brush with 1 tablespoon olive oil
Cover and refrigerate for 15 to 30 minutes
Meanwhile, whisk remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, mustard, orange zest, cumin, and fennel together in a small glass bowl
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Brush chicken with orange-mustard sauce and arrange on the preheated grill
Cook, turning often and brushing with more of the sauce, until legs are no longer pink at the bone and juices run clear, 16 to 18 minutes
Transfer chicken to a platter and garnish with cilantro
